metadata.title: Krupomol
metadata.desc: LLC "Ukrainian Agro-industrial Transport Group" has been specializing in the production of high-quality cereals for the Ukrainian and international markets for over 10 years. Its own production, control at all stages, and compliance with world standards allow us to ensure stable product quality that meets the requirements of the modern market.

hero.title: Reliability and quality in every grain

certification.title: Certification
certification.text: Our products comply with international standards of quality and food safety, which is confirmed by ISO 22000 and ISO 9001 certificates. Control at all stages of production guarantees stable quality and compliance with the requirements of the global market.

metadata.title: Products | Krupomol
metadata.desc: Wholesale supplies of natural cereals of the highest quality from a certified manufacturer

hero.title: Natural cereals of the highest quality

list.text: Pearl barley is a natural product made from whole barley grains by cleaning and grinding. Thanks to minimal processing, it retains all its beneficial substances, including B vitamins, magnesium, phosphorus, and fiber. This cereal is versatile in cooking: it is used to make porridge, soups, pilaf and other dishes. Pearl barley is very filling, promotes normal digestion and maintains energy for the whole day. Choose pearl barley for a balanced diet and natural taste in your favorite dishes!
list.title: Pearl barley groats

list.text: Unpretentiousness and high nutritional value are why barley groats are valued in cooking. The production of this groats is a process that preserves the natural benefits of barley, preserving fiber, vitamins, and trace elements. Barley groats are a versatile product that is suitable for making cereals, soups, and side dishes. They easily adapt to different culinary traditions, preserving their benefits in any cooking method. Choose high-quality barley groats for your daily diet - this is natural taste and benefits in every spoonful!
list.title: Barley products

list.text: Unpretentiousness and high nutritional value are why barley groats are valued in cooking. The production of this groats is a process that preserves the natural benefits of barley, preserving fiber, vitamins, and trace elements. Barley groats are a versatile product that is suitable for making cereals, soups, and side dishes. They easily adapt to different culinary traditions, preserving their benefits in any cooking method. Choose high-quality barley groats for your daily diet - this is natural taste and benefits in every spoonful!
list.title: Barley products

list.text: This is a natural product made from durum wheat, which retains all the beneficial properties of the grain. It is rich in proteins, fiber, B vitamins and trace elements necessary for energy and health. Due to its versatility, wheat groats are ideal for cereals, side dishes, soups and casseroles. It is well digested, providing a long-lasting feeling of satiety. Choose wheat groats for a balanced diet and delicious meals every day!
list.title: Wheat groats

list.text: Pea groats are a high-quality product obtained by peeling and grinding peas. They have high nutritional value due to the high content of vegetable protein (up to 23%), fiber, vitamins and minerals. We offer large-scale supply of pea groats for the food industry, feed production and export. The products meet quality standards, are packed in bags or big bags for convenient transportation. We guarantee stable deliveries and individual terms of cooperation for wholesale customers.
list.title: Pea groats

list.text: Buckwheat is one of the most valuable products in the world of healthy eating, combining natural purity and a wealth of nutrients. It is rich in protein, fiber, B vitamins, magnesium, iron and other minerals. We offer wholesale supplies of high-quality buckwheat, packed in bags or big bags. The products meet all international standards and are ready for export to any country.
list.title: Buckwheat groats

offer.title: What do we offer to our clients?
offer.text: LLC "Ukrainian Agro-industrial Transport Group" is a manufacturing enterprise specializing in the production of high-quality cereals. We offer products that meet international standards, ensuring stable supplies for wholesale buyers and exports. Flexible terms of cooperation, as well as the possibility of payment in both cash and non-cash forms, make our products accessible to different categories of customers.

list: Calculation of delivery costs: 0.1 UAH for each kilogram of product for every 100 km of route

metadata.title: Certification | Krupomol
metadata.desc: "Ukrainian Agro-industrial Transport Group" LLC adheres to the highest standards of quality and product safety. All our products undergo thorough control at every stage of production - from the selection of raw materials to packaging and storage.

hero.title: Product certification
hero.desc: LLC "Ukrainian Agro-industrial Transport Group" adheres to the highest standards of product quality and safety. All our products undergo thorough control at every stage of production - from raw material selection to packaging and storage.

list.title: ISO 22000 – Food Safety Management System
list.desc: The certificate certifies compliance with the ISO 22000 standard - Food Safety Management System

list.title: ISO 9001 – Quality management system
list.desc: The certificate certifies compliance with the ISO 9001 standard - Quality Management System

list.title: ISO 9001 – Quality management system
list.desc: The certificate certifies compliance with the ISO 9001 standard - Quality Management System

list.title: High level of product quality
list.desc: The certification confirms that our products are manufactured in compliance with strict requirements for raw materials, technological process and final product. We carry out multi-level quality control, which includes laboratory tests and verification of compliance with all established standards.

list.title: Compliance with international standards
list.desc: ISO and HACCP certificates confirm that our products and production processes meet international food safety requirements. This allows us to supply products to markets in Europe, Asia and other regions where high quality standards apply.

list.title: Safety for consumers
list.desc: We guarantee that our products do not contain harmful impurities, meet environmental standards and retain all useful properties. Thanks to the implementation of the HACCP system, we identify and minimize risks at each stage of production.

list.title: Possibility of export to EU countries and other regions
list.desc: Certified products meet the legal requirements of international markets, which opens up wide opportunities for export. This allows us to work with European, Asian and other foreign partners, providing them with high-quality products.

certification.info: Thanks to these guarantees, our customers can be confident in the quality, safety, and reliability of the products they receive.
